good.comment: Plane message under 10 s delay are displayed with color black

poor.comment: Plane message between 10s and 30 s delay are displayed with color yellow

bad.comment: Plane message between 30s and 60 s delay are displayed with color red

ghost.comment: displayed with color red plane between bad quality and client timeout

memory.comment: Clear plane memory after 60s on client side and clear plane memory after 180s on server side
